## Read in data

```{r}
energy <- read_csv("data/us_energy.csv")
energy
```

create a line chart of energy over time, with color based on the energy type.

```{r}
ggplot(data = energy, aes(x = year, y = quadrillion_btu, group = type)) +
  geom_line(aes(color = type))
```
